Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8 Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable Goodreads staffers share their favorite books of the year, genre trends, an= d more! =20 =20 =20 =20 Goodreads [http://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1501097225-1501097225_goodreads_misc.png] [https://www.goodreads.com?rto=3Dx_gr_e_nl_general&utm_medium=3Demail&utm_s= ource=3Dnewsletter&utm_campaign=3DDec202018&utm_content=3Dheader] =20 =20 =20 =20 =20 =20 =20 Staff Picks https://www.goodreads.com/blog/show/1433 Goodreads Staff Picks=20 [https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1544729984-1544729984_goodreads_misc.jpg= ] Goodreads Employees Share Their Favorite Books of 2018 Have you read any good books lately? Here at Goodreads we certainly have. A= s the year draws to a close, we asked our Goodreads coworkers a simple yet = tough question: What were the top three books you read this year? Read More =20 =20 =20 =20 Your Year in Books! https://www.goodreads.com/blog/show/1452 Year In Books=20 [https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1544730224-1544730224_goodreads_misc.jpg= ] A Look Back at Your Year of Reading It's time to review your 2018 reading journey with a personalizedYear in Booksinfographic that shows all of your bo= okish milestones. Plus, peek at the reading habits of some other Goodreads = members, including Bill Gates, Roxane Gay, Celeste Ng, and Sarah Jessica Pa= rker. Read More =20 =20 =20 =20 =20 =20 =20 Exclusive Interview https://www.goodreads.com/interviews/show/1412.Diane_Setterfield Interview Setterfield=20 [https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1544730112-1544730112_goodreads_misc.jpg= ] Once Upon a River Explores the Power of StorytellingDiane Setterfield'sOnce Upon a Rivertak= es readers to the edge of the Thames River in the late 19th century as a st= ranger arrives at an inn carrying a drowned child. When the girl suddenly a= wakens, the villagers struggle to interpret what it means. Setterfield talk= ed to Goodreads about how we use stories to make sense of the world. Read More =20 =20 =20 =20 In the Club https://www.goodreads.com/blog/show/1453-the-24-most-popular-book-club-pick= s-of-the-year Top.Book.Club.Picks=20 [https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1544730322-1544730322_goodreads_misc.jpg= ] The Year's 24 Top Book Club Picks Want to impress your book club with the crowd-pleasing pick? We've got you = covered. We looked at Goodreads members' most popular book club selections = of the year, in genres including memoir, historical fiction, history, and m= ystery. Read More =20 =20 =20 =20 =20 =20 =20 2018 Trends https://www.goodreads.com/blog/show/1440-the-sci-fi-fantasy-trends-of-2018 SF.Fantasy.Trends=20 [https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1544730955-1544730955_goodreads_misc.jpg= ] Modern Takes on Myths Ruled 2018's Sci-Fi & Fantasy A new take on Odysseus' witch and a feministRumpelstiltskinwere ex= amples of the year's biggest trends in fantasy and sci-fi: the retelling. R= eaders also loved a new breed of books that blurred the lines between these= two genres. Read More https://www.goodreads.com/blog/show/1455-mystery-solved-the-thriller-trends= -of-2018 Mystery.Trends=20 [https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1544730182-1544730182_goodreads_misc.jpg= ] Women Controlled the Plot Twists this Year Women take over (as men try to blend in) and the new British invasion are t= wo of the trends we detected as we examined the most popular mysteries and = thrillers of the year.               How flexible of a thinker are you? Give it a 5
second test: quickly identify the color of each of the words
below (don=E2=80=99t read them). Say the colors out loud.

Get Premium - 25% off

How accurate were you? How long did it take? This task, called
the Stroop Test, is much more challenging than it first appears.
It's much harder to identify a color when it's different from the
word than it is to identify when the two match. This challenging
test relies on two key cognitive skills, response inhibition and
selective attention.

Brief history of the Stroop Test
--------------------------------

In 1935, a farmer's son named John Ridley Stroop became the
first to publish in English on the current version of this
cognitive task. Developed as part of his dissertation at George
Peabody College, his task became the basis for the Stroop Test,
which remains a widely used neuropsychological assessment to this
day.

How your brain processes the Stroop Test
----------------------------------------

Because most people=E2=80=99s automatic response is to read a word, the
Stroop Test is a classic test of response inhibition. This skill
involves responding quickly while avoiding incorrect impulses
that may interfere with accomplishing goal-driven tasks. Response
inhibition is associated with the brain=E2=80=99s executive function, and
brain imaging studies have found that that performing the Stroop
Test activates brain areas involved in executive function, such
as the dorsolateral prefrontal cortex.

The Stroop Test also challenges selective attention, or the
ability to choose which stimuli to focus on and which to ignore.
The mental flexibility required to switch between multiple
stimuli is essential: without good selective attention, it can
also be easy to make errors.

Try a version of Stroop's test for yourself
-------------------------------------------

Stroop's test has long outlived him. Cited thousands of times,
his original paper is one of the most famous studies in
experimental psychology. Versions of his test continue to be used
in research =E2=80=94 and you can try a version for yourself by playing
Lumosity's Color Match!

From lab to laptop: The origins of Lumosity games
-------------------------------------------------

For decades, researchers have created tasks that measure
cognitive abilities. Traditionally, these are often administered
during in-person studies using pen and paper =E2=80=94 which means they
rarely get far from the lab.

That=E2=80=99s where we come in. Our scientists and game designers work
together to turn common cognitive and neuropsychological research
tasks into fun, exciting games =E2=80=94 bringing cognitive research to
70 million people worldwide.

From cognitive task to engaging game
------------------------------------

When creating a new game, our in-house scientists first identify
a cognitive ability, such as working memory or divided attention.
They then find a way to challenge that skill. They=E2=80=99ll either
adapt cognitive or neuropsychological tasks used by researchers
for decades to test cognition, or they=E2=80=99ll use their knowledge and
research experience to design entirely new, experimental
challenges.

Working with experienced game designers, our scientists transform
these tasks into over 50 beautiful, challenging, and fun games
that anyone can access from a computer or mobile device. Many of
our games adapt to a player=E2=80=99s ability level, ensuring that each
person is challenged to the full extent of their abilities.

Become a Premium Member

The origins of popular Lumosity games
-------------------------------------

Let=E2=80=99s examine the roots of some popular Lumosity games. The
much-loved Color Match is inspired by the Stroop Task, which was
first published in English in 1935 as a way to assess impulse
control. Since that time, the Stroop Task has been cited in over
2000 psychological studies and adapted by many researchers.

Or how about Lost in Migration, which you may have played to
challenge your selective attention? It=E2=80=99s based on the Flanker
Task, which was designed to help researchers investigate
selective attention.

More than games: creating a personal trainer
--------------------------------------------

Modeled from the concept of a physical personal trainer,
Lumosity gives you a wide variety of games that challenge many
abilities, such as Memory and Attention. Game difficulty adapts
to you =E2=80=94 pushing you to operate at the limits of your abilities
and stay challenged.

As we learn more about the possibilities of brain training, we
invite you to keep training, and join us in our mission to
advance the understanding of human cognition.

ipated science fiction, mysteries, and more!

Maid=20
[https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1547252941-1547252941_goodreads_misc.jpg=
]

A New Memoir Offers the Real Dirt About Not Getting By

Stephanie Land=E2=80=99s memoir,Maid: Hard Work, =
Low Pay, and a Mother's Will to Survive, chronicles her time living=
 in poverty, working as a house cleaner, and struggling to survive on $9 an=
 hour. She talked to Goodreads about writing, the American dream, and how t=
o treat the people you hire.
Read More

ooks-of-2019

]

The Biggest Sci-Fi & Fantasy Books of 2019

Don't let the real world get you down. Escape to other planets, timelines, =
and realms with the most eagerly awaited science fiction and fantasy releas=
es, including novels fromAnn Leckie,Neal Stephenson, andErin Morgenstern.

2019

]

The Year's 36 Hottest Mysteries & Thrillers

A new year means new thrills and chills for mystery and thriller lovers. In=
 2019 you'll find plenty of motives to keep you turning the pages, with boo=
ks fromHarlan Coben,Paula Hawkins,Ruth Ware, and many more!

th a new thriller this May. Get an exclusive sneak peek here!

Golden Child=20
[https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1547246574-1547246574_goodreads_misc.jpg=
]

Parents' Best Intentions Go Awry in 'Golden Child'

The novelGolden Childfollows the =
lives of a hardworking family as they navigate choices about loyalty and lo=
ve when one of their 13-year-old twins disappears. Author Claire Adam says =
her story was inspired by the personal sacrifices she witnessed during Trin=
idad's mass emigration in the 1980s and '90s.
Read More

https://www.goodreads.com/interviews/show/1418.Dana_Czapnik

The Falconer=20
[https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1547251026-1547251026_goodreads_misc.jpg=
]

Unrequited Love and Basketball Rule in 'The Falconer'

The coming-of-age debutThe Falconert=
akes place in 1993 on New York City's public basketball courts, where 17-ye=
ar-old Lucy Adler dominates the game. Former sportswriter Dana Czapnik chat=
ted with Goodreads about writing the novel she always wanted to read.

A mystery in the Outback, highly anticipated historical fiction, and more!
 
  
         
 
 Goodreads
[http://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1501097225-1501097225_goodreads_misc.png]
[https://www.goodreads.com?rto=x_gr_e_nl_general&utm_medium=email&utm_source=newsletter&utm_campaign=Feb192019&utm_content=header]
   
         
 
  
            
 
 

Exclusive Interview



https://www.goodreads.com/interviews/show/1427.Jane_Harper

Jane Harper Interview 
[https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1549669650-1549669650_goodreads_misc.jpg]

A Mystery Set in Heat, Dust, and Isolation of the Outback

In a few short years,Jane Harperhas become one of the mystery genre's rising stars. As her bestselling debut,The Dry, is being adapted for film, her third book,The Lost Man, is hitting bookshelves. Harper talked to Goodreads about how she structures her stories and the terrible beauty of the Australian Outback.
Read More
  
         
 
  
         
 
 

Historical Fiction



https://www.goodreads.com/blog/show/1482-the-season-s-hottest-historical-fiction

Historical Fiction 
[https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1549669703-1549669703_goodreads_misc.jpg]

16 Not-to-Miss New Historical Fiction Novels

Get ready to be transported to multiple erasfrom Taylor Jenkins Reid's 1970s California rock and roll rompDaisy Jones & the SixtoEat, Pray, Loveauthor Elizabeth Gilbert's 1940s New York City love storyCity of Girlswith these highly anticipated historical fiction novels.
Read More

https://www.goodreads.com/interviews/show/1425.Kate_Quinn

Kate Quinn Interview 
[https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1549669726-1549669726_goodreads_misc.jpg]

'The Alice Network' Author Returns to WWII with 'The Huntress'Kate Quinnis following up her World War II novelThe Alice Networkwith the hunt for a Nazi in postwar America inThe Huntress. Quinn talked to Goodreads about her research and shares five of her favorite novels set during the Second World War.
Read More
  
         
 
  
         
 
 

First Lady of Book Clubs



https://www.goodreads.com/blog/show/1498

Michelle Obama 
[https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1549669681-1549669681_goodreads_misc.jpg]

Michelle Obama on Her Love of Book Clubs

Former First Lady and bestselling authorMichelle Obamahas written this exclusive letter on what book clubs have meant to her. Plus, she's answering Goodreads members' questions about her memoir,Becoming.
Read More
  
         
 
 

On-the-Job Reading



https://www.goodreads.com/blog/show/1486-what-to-read-when-work-is-stranger-than-fiction

Interview Titanic 
[https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1549669745-1549669745_goodreads_misc.jpg]

A Musician's Memoir of the World's Worst GigJessica Chiccehitto Hindman's new memoir,Sounds Like Titanic, chronicles her time pretending to play classical music in a New York City orchestra. "We were like the Milli Vanilli of classical music, or as I call us in the book, 'Milli Violini,'" she says. She's also recommending five more books about work life.
Read More

 * Catch up now:These big series all have books coming out in March.

The most anticipated books of spring, a rocking read, and more!
 
  
         
 
 Goodreads
[http://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1501097225-1501097225_goodreads_misc.png]
[https://www.goodreads.com?rto=x_gr_e_nl_general&utm_medium=email&utm_source=newsletter&utm_campaign=march052019&utm_content=header]
   
         
 
  
            
 
 

Spring Reading



https://www.goodreads.com/blog/show/1520

Spring Books 
[https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1551128484-1551128484_goodreads_misc.jpg]

The 39 Buzziest Books of Spring

This spring offers plenty of reasons to cancel your plans and curl up with a good book. FromNormal People, the literary sensation that's already a bestseller in the U.K., to the domestic thrillerThe Mother-in-Law, there's something for every reader to enjoy.
Read More
  
         
 
 

Exclusive Interview



https://www.goodreads.com/interviews/show/1435

Daisy Jones Interview 
[https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1551720787-1551720787_goodreads_misc.jpg]

Taylor Jenkins Reid Explores Sex, Drugs, and Rock and RollTaylor Jenkins Reidchanneled 1950s Hollywood glamour for her hitThe Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo. Now she's bringing plenty of Fleetwood Mac vibes to her 1970s rock and roll romp,Daisy Jones & the Six. She talked to Goodreads about writing strong female characters in male dominated fields.
Read More
  
         
 
  
         
 
 
  
         
 
 

Good Minds Suggest



https://www.goodreads.com/interviews/show/1433.Helen_Oyeyemi

GMS.Gingerbread 
[https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1551204551-1551204551_goodreads_misc.jpg]

The Sweet Magic of Helen Oyeyemi's 'Gingerbread'Boy, Snow, BirdauthorHelen Oyeyemiis known for rule-defying writing infused with enchantment. This spring she's back with the magical bedtime taleGingerbread. Oyeyemi shares her inspiration for the new novel and recommends more books that turn literary convention on its head.
Read More
  
         
 
 

Debut Spotlight



https://www.goodreads.com/interviews/show/1431.Anne_Griffin

Debut.Griffin 
[https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1551204624-1551204624_goodreads_misc.jpg]

A Refreshing Debut Told Through Irish Toasts

In the debutWhen All Is Said, an elderly farmer spends an evening in a pub where he says a toast to the five most important people in his life.Anne Griffintold Goodreads how her novel was inspired by a chance run-in with a man during a family vacation and the brief chat that left her "gobsmacked."
Read More
  
         
 
  
         
 
  
 March's Hot Books



https://www.goodreads.com/blog/show/1516

The Island of Sea Women 
[https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1551128648-1551128648_goodreads_misc.png]
The Island of Sea Women by Lisa See
In this novel, two Korean girls in the 1930s join their village's all-female diving collective, beginning a life of excitement and danger.
Add This Book
Before She Knew Him 
[https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1551128541-1551128541_goodreads_misc.png]
Before She Knew Him by Peter Swanson
A suburban wife with a history of psychological instability has fears about her new neighbor that could lead them both to murder.
Add This Book

The Bird King 
[https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1551128582-1551128582_goodreads_misc.png]
The Bird King by G. Willow Wilson
This epic fantasy from the author of the Hugo Award-winning comic book seriesMs. Marvelis set during the height of the Spanish Inquisition.
Add This Book
Once & Future 
[https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1551128624-1551128624_goodreads_misc.png]
Once & Future by Amy Rose Capetta and Cori McCarthy
This YA fantasy is a gender-bending King Arthur retelling as a young woman is revealed to be the reincarnation of the legendary leader.
Add This Book

Girl, Stop Apologizing 
[https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1551128604-1551128604_goodreads_misc.png]
Girl, Stop Apologizing by Rachel Hollis
In this follow-up to her bestselling bookGirl, Wash Your Face, Hollis encourages women to stop talking themselves out of their dreams.
Add This Book
Shout 
[https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1551128671-1551128671_goodreads_misc.png]
Shout by Laurie Halse Anderson
Anderson was inspired to write this memoir after hearing from fans of her 1999 novel,Speak, about a young sexual-assault survivor.
Add This Book

Exclusive Interview



https://www.goodreads.com/interviews/show/1443.Elizabeth_Gilbert

Gilbert Interview 
[https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1558728536-1558728536_goodreads_misc.jpg]

Devastated by Desire? Not in Elizabeth Gilbert's New Novel

In 2006,Elizabeth Gilbert's memoir,Eat, Pray, Love, made her a household name. Now she's back with her ninth booka sexy romp through a showgirl-populated 1940s New York City inCity of Girls. She told Goodreads why she set out to write a novel "about promiscuous women whose lives are not beset by ruination."

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8 Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit Colson Whitehead talks about his first book since the Pulitzer-winning Underground Railroad, the Reading Challenge's most popular books, and the new stars of YA! Goodreads [http://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1501097225-1501097225_goodreads_misc.png] [https://www.goodreads.com?rto=x_gr_e_nl_general&utm_medium=email&utm_source=newsletter&utm_campaign=july162019&utm_content=header] Exclusive Interview https://www.goodreads.com/interviews/show/1456.Colson_Whitehead Colson Whitehead Interview [https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1562620231-1562620231_goodreads_misc.jpg] Colson Whitehead Is Back with The Nickel BoysColson Whitehead's last novel won a Pulitzer Prize and a National Book Award, and it was selected by Oprah's Book Club. He talked to Goodreads about following upThe Underground Railroadwith the devastating Jim Crow-era novelThe Nickel Boys, as well as confronting America's history. Read More Reading Challenge https://www.goodreads.com/blog/show/1621-the-most-read-books-of-the-2019-reading-challenge Reading Challenge Most Read [https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1562620276-1562620276_goodreads_misc.jpg] The Most Read Books of the Reading Challenge More than 3 million readers have joined this year'sGoodreads Reading Challenge, pledging to finish more than 188 million books in 2019. With that many voracious readers in one spot, we were curious to see which books they've read during the first half of the year. Check out what we found! Read More YA's New Voices https://www.goodreads.com/blog/show/1630 YA Week Rising Stars [https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1562620304-1562620304_goodreads_misc.jpg] The Rising Stars of the Young Adult Genre These 44 new novelists are making waves in the YA world. With titles includingThe Hate U Give,The Poet X, andChildren of Blood and Bone, these buzzy and award-winning authors show how much bigger the young adult category has grown since the days of a famous boy wizard. Read More Book Ends * Your Want to Read shelf cannot begin to handle the32 buzziest debuts of the year (so far). * FromBig Little Liesto Outback-noir,Australian crime novels are having a moment. * Can you be "too old" to read YA novels?Our expert opinion: No way. * Meet your next literary rom-com obsession, authorJasmine Guillory. * We're not done yet! The 41 Most Anticipated Books of the Season

As the weather cools down, the books get hotter! This fall we're seeing the=
 arrival of Margaret Atwood'sThe Testament=
sand Elizabeth Strout'sOlive, Again. There's also Erin Morgenstern's sophomore fantasy,The Starless Sea, Ta-Nehisi Coates' first novel,The Water Dancer, and so many more gr=
eat reads.

]

Malcolm Gladwell Investigates Real Stranger Dangers

Over the past two decades, all ofMalcolm Gladwell's booksfromThe Tipping PointtoDavid and Goliathhave dominated the bestseller lists and=
 made him one of today's best known nonfiction writers. In his new book, he=
 looks at how strangers mistake one another's words and motives through sev=
eral high-profile scandals.

queline Woodsonhas won just about every literary award there is for he=
r children=E2=80=99s, young adult, and adult work. She's back this month wi=
th her novelRed at the Bone=
i>, and she's telling Goodreads about some of her all-time-favorite boo=
ks.

Return to Gilead

Margaret Atwood Interview=20
[https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1565797381-1565797381_goodreads_misc.jpg=
]

Margaret Atwood Continues Her Dystopian Classic

Thirty-four years after the publication of her iconic novel,The Handmaid's Tale,Margaret Atwoodreturns to the totalitarian r=
egime to pick up where she left readerswith one of literature's most=
 famous cliffhangers. Atwood talked to Goodreads about the sequel,The Testaments, and why it was time to wri=
te about Gilead's fall.

Coates' Debut

Coates Interview=20
[https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1565797402-1565797402_goodreads_misc.jpg=
]

Ta-Nehisi Coates Wades Into Historical FictionTa-Nehisi Coatesis known as=
 an author, journalist, and (in recent years) comic book writer. Now he can=
 add novelist to his growing r=C3=A9sum=C3=A9. His debut novel,The Water Dancer, hits shelv=
es this month. Coates discussed with Goodreads the idea of infusing histori=
cal fiction with magic and who gets to be an American hero.

Patti Smith Talks About the 'Stories That Take Root'

Rock & Roll Hall of Fame inductee, award-winning writer, photographer, acti=
vist, and all-around Renaissance woman=
Patti Smithis back with her third memoir,Year of the Monkey. Here Smith explains her crea=
tive process, howLittle Womeninspired her to become a writer, and =
the secret to her professional longevity.

rroughshas been candid about his struggles with addiction, sexual abus=
e, and his dysfunctional family. But it's his new memoir,Toil & Trouble, that's finally pushed him outs=
ide of his comfort zone. It's about the one topic that=E2=80=99s always bee=
n off the table: his life as a witch.

he danger of comparing yourself to Ta-Nehisi Coates.

We talk to Carmen Maria Machado about her groundbreaking new memoir, short books to finish your Reading Challenge, and more!    
  

           Goodreads

Exclusive Interview



https://www.goodreads.com/interviews/show/1477.Carmen_Maria_Machado

Carmen Machado Interview 
[https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1572366255-1572366255_goodreads_misc.jpg]

'In the Dream House' Breaks New Ground in MemoirCarmen Maria Machadoburst onto the literary scene in 2017 with her acclaimed short story collection,Her Body and Other Parties. She talked to Goodreads about the followup to that book,In the Dream House, a personaland wildly originalmemoir about an abusive relationship she had with a woman in graduate school.
Read More
  
  

            
  

           

Quick Reads



https://www.goodreads.com/blog/show/1723

32 Short Books 
[https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1572366183-1572366183_goodreads_misc.jpg]

32 Short New Books to Crush Your Reading Challenge

Your2019 Goodreads Reading Challengegoal is just within reach, and we're here to help you finish the reading year with some great new booksall under 300 pages! Whether you're in the mood for literary fiction, true crime, humor, or a thriller, we have the perfect ideas for your end-of-year reading plans.
Read More
  
  

           

Jewell's Gems



https://www.goodreads.com/blog/show/1713-author-lisa-jewell-shares-her-favorite-domestic-suspense-novels

Lisa Jewell Recommends 
[https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1572366221-1572366221_goodreads_misc.jpg]

Lisa Jewell's Favorite Domestic Suspense Novels

Mystery writerLisa Jewellis back with a twisty new thriller. InThe Family Upstairs, a young woman inherits a mansion from the family she never knewand discovers that the house brings with it the keys to her own disturbing history. Jewell is recommending more recent psychological thrillers to keep readers on the edge of their seats.

Hi,

We hope you are enjoying Spotify. In order to provide you with a personaliz=
ed Spotify experience, we collect data about you and what you listen to. Ou=
r goal is to always be open and transparent about what data we collect and =
how it=E2=80=99s used to deliver your Spotify experience.=20

We=E2=80=99re contacting you to let you know that we=E2=80=99ll be making s=
ome changes to our Privacy Policy, which will be effective as of January 1,=
 2020.=20

What=E2=80=99s New:

We=E2=80=99ve made updates that increase the readability and transparency o=
f our Privacy Policy;


We=E2=80=99ve added more detail on the privacy resources that we provide to=
 you;


We=E2=80=99ve added information about how we collect and use data to delive=
r new products or features; and


If you are a California resident, we=E2=80=99ve included a Privacy Policy s=
upplement for California residents describing additional privacy rights as =
provided under the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA).


Please click here to read the updated Privacy Policy, which will become eff=
ective on January 1, 2020.=20

If you have any questions, please visit our Privacy Center for more informa=
tion and to contact us.

Thanks for using Spotify!

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8 Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable The most anticipated mysteries of the year, our exclusive interview with th= e American Dirt author, and more! =20 =20 Goodreads [http://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1501538213-1501538213_goodreads_misc.png] [https://www.goodreads.com?rto=3Dx_gr_e_nl_general&utm_medium=3Demail&utm_s= ource=3Dnewsletter&utm_campaign=3Djan222020&utm_content=3Dheader] =20 =20 =20 =20 =20 Currently Reading Currently Reading book cover [https://d.gr-assets.com/books/1529668940l/406= 09936.jpg] Dinesh Companion Biology Class XI (Vol. I & II) Update progress [https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/40609936?utm_medium=3Demail&utm_source= =3Dnewsletter&utm_campaign=3Djan222020&utm_content=3Dbotm] =20 =20 =20 =20 =20 Oh, the Suspense! https://www.goodreads.com/blog/show/1744 Anticipated Mysteries=20 [https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1576267984-1576267984_goodreads_misc.jpg= ] The Most Anticipated Mysteries & Thrillers of 2020 The new year is guaranteed to bring plenty of suspense, chills, thrills, an= d occasional horrors=E2=80=94and we're just talking about the new mysteries= and thrillers that await readers. From the return of favorite suspense mas= ters to buzzy debuts, there's little doubt that your TBR pile will be suspi= ciously large this year. Read More =20 =20 =20 =20 =20 New Voices https://www.goodreads.com/blog/show/1769-21-debut-authors-to-discover-now Debut Authors=20 [https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1576788809-1576788809_goodreads_misc.jpg= ] 21 Debut Authors to Discover Now It's time to usher in a brand-new class of debut authors to discover. And t= he beginning of 2020 has plenty of fresh voices to add to your Want to Read= shelf. Here you'll find some of the buzziest fiction debuts that are catch= ing our readers' attentionand they perfectly capture the present mom= ent. Read More =20 =20 =20 Exclusive Interview https://www.goodreads.com/interviews/show/1484.Jeanine_Cummins Cummins Interview=20 [https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1576267915-1576267915_goodreads_misc.jpg= ] American Dirt's Modern Migrant Story Fueled by years of research and a sudden devastating loss,Jeanine Cummins'American Dirtis a high-octane story of a woman and son fleein= g Mexican gang violence, hoping to find safe haven in the U.S. Cummins talk= ed about the real-life "horror stories" that inspired her new bookan= d why she had to be angry to write it. **Mission JEE Main April 2020**.

Stop waiting champ. You have

Hello Adarsh,Hope you are having a great week.=
 We have important news to share. Zomato has acquired Uber Eats in India. W=
ith the Uber Eats India drivers and restaurant partners joining Zomato, our=
 network is now bigger than ever.This means you will have access to the largest choice o=
f restaurants and fastest delivery.We thank you for your love and suppor=
t in our journey to build the largest and most loved food app in the countr=
y. We look forward to continuing to serve you.Thank you,Deepinder GoyalFounder & CEO, ZomatoIn case you wish to stop receiving =
emails from Zomato, pleaseunsubscribe here

This Republic Day, exercise yourRight To Eat with Zomato. Let your mouth burst with desi flavours as we deliver In=
dia=E2=80=99s favourite cuisines straight to your plate!Sit back, relax and take your taste buds to the tastiest =

Please do not reply it.Successfully submitted PART-I of the application.Dear Applicant,You have successfully submitted PART-I of your application for National Defence Academy & Naval Academy Examination (I) - 2020.Your Registration-ID is  12009832035. Please note down this number for all future references.You are furtheradvised to complete PART-II of your applicationfor which you need to enter  your  RID no. and Date of Birth.You are required to pay the FEE if you are not a FEE exempted candidate. The Valid modes for payment of fee are CASH in any of the SBI Branch or  VISA / MASTERCARD/Rupay/Prepaid debit/credit card (of any bank) or Internet Banking of SBI. You are also required to fill up your choice of Centre and upload your photo, signature & photo id document in Part II.  You are also required to agree to the declaration before finally submitting it.  Pl note your application is incomplete without submitting details of Part II and you will not be a candidate for the aforesaid examination.Union Public Service Commission

We interview the author of the highly anticipated debut My Dark Vanessa, highlight women historians, and much more!    
  

           Goodreads
[http://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1501538213-1501538213_goodreads_misc.png]
[https://www.goodreads.com?rto=x_gr_e_nl_general&utm_medium=email&utm_source=newsletter&utm_campaign=march032020&utm_content=header]
       
  

            
  
 

Currently ReadingCurrently Reading book cover [https://d.gr-assets.com/books/1529668940l/40609936.jpg]
Dinesh Companion Biology Class XI (Vol. I & II)

 Update
progressExclusive InterviewRussell Interview [https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1582327937-1582327937_goodreads_misc.jpg]
A Debut Novel for the #MeToo MovementKate Elizabeth Russellbegan writing her novel about a teenager's relationship with her English teacher when she was still in high school herself. NowMy Dark Vanessais one of 2020's most anticipated debuts. Russell talked to Goodreads about the #MeToo movement, literary controversies, and telling stories about abuse.Read
more
[https://www.goodreads.com/interviews/show/1502.Kate_Elizabeth_Russell?rto=x_gr_e_nl_general&utm_medium=email&utm_source=newsletter&utm_campaign=march032020&utm_content=Russell.Interview]    
  

            
  

           


Women's History MonthWomen Historians [https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1582327858-1582327858_goodreads_misc.jpg]
Historian Alexis Coe: Why It Matters Who Tells the StoryWhenAlexis Coetold people that she was working on a biography of George Washington, they often seemed confused. A woman writing about Washington? Now that herYou Never Forget Your Firstis out in stores, Coe talked to Goodreads about the importance of women historians and recommended some of her cohorts' work.Read
more
[https://www.goodreads.com/blog/show/1794?rto=x_gr_e_nl_general&utm_medium=email&utm_source=newsletter&utm_campaign=march032020&utm_content=Women.Historians]    
  

           


Self-ReflectionSelf Help Books [https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1582327896-1582327896_goodreads_misc.jpg]
Picks from Podcasters Who Try Out Self-Help BooksIn each episode of theirBy the Bookpodcast,Jolenta GreenbergandKristen Meinzertake a deep dive into a self-help book, following its advice to the letter. They've turned those insights intoHow to Be Fine: What We Learned from Living by the Rules of 50 Self-Help Books, and they're sharing some of their favorite books.Read
more
[https://www.goodreads.com/blog/show/1812?rto=x_gr_e_nl_general&utm_medium=email&utm_source=newsletter&utm_campaign=march032020&utm_content=Self.Help.Books]

fer.Prepare your r=
eturn with confidence using these tips.=<=

uMaan Family and Community,During this time we understand that everyone is sensitive t=
o what is happening around the world. First and foremost, we hope that ever=
yone is healthy and safe. We are aware of how serious this situation is and=
 how it affects all of us.We wanted to take this time to address and make aware =
of the measures were taking as a company during this crisis:<=
/p>BluMaan has=
 issued a work from home policy.We have ens=
ured that customer services will still be available to all our customers wi=
th the same response time.We are in c=
onstant and immediate contact with all of our warehouses and laboratories. =
This is done to ensure that attentive sanitation is being done around the c=
lock. Safety and cleanliness are of the utmost importance to us.As governme=
nts and health professionals continue to bring new findings forward, the Bl=
uMaan Team will adjust protocols and safety measures to suit the changing h=
ealth climate and ensure everyones health and safety.=
li>As=
 we learn more about this pandemic, we feel it's important for our employee=
s and guests to have the opportunity to stay home and support their family,=
 friends and loved ones.As the BluMaan Team continues to operate from home, we want t=
o remind you that YOU are the backbone that continues to help us grow, and =
so the BluMaan community will always be a priority to us.If you have any questions ple=
ase dont hesitate to contact our customer service:info@blumaan.com- The BluMaan Team30 DAY SATISFACTION GUARANTEECopyright  2020 BluMa=

Dear Candidate,

Hope you are staying safe and preparing for your upcoming exams!

Keeping in view the current Covid-19 situation, advisories received from competent authorities, and several requests from prospective candidates, the BITSAT application deadline is extended till 15th April 2020 (5.00pm). However, BITSAT-2020 examination dates remain unchanged. Few earlier announced deadlines are modified as below to accommodate this change:

Deadline to apply online for BITSAT-2020: 15th April 2020 (5.00pm)

Revision/editing (online) in the application form by candidates: 17th April (10.00am) - 18th April 2020 (5.00pm)

Test city allotment and announcement to candidates: 22nd April 2020

Candidates to reserve Test date and slot: 25th April (10.00am) - 27th April 2020 (5.00pm)

Candidates to download the Hall tickets with instructions: 30th April - 18th May 2020

We shall keep you informed further updates as and when necessary. You can reach out to us in case of any concerns you may have related to admissions at BITS, Pilani.


Best wishes,
Admissions Team, BITS-Pilani

In pursuance of MHRD's D.O. letter number Secy (HE)/ MHRD/2020 dated 3rdApril 2020regarding the above subject, the following is informed to all candidates, their parents and family members for immediate necessary action at their end -Arogya Setu App has been developed to fight against COVID -19. This App will be helpful to students, faculty/ teachers and their family members. The candidates, their parents and family members can download the App from:iOS:itms-apps://itunes.apple.com/app/id505825357Android:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=nic.goi.aarogyasetuMinistry of AYUSH has developed a protocol for immunity boosting measures for self care. The same is also available at the NTA website(nta.ac.in)for download and guidance.As advised by the Hon'ble Prime Minister on 3rdApril 2020, students may light a candle, diya or torch of their mobile for9 minutes at 9 pm on 5thApril 2020 to realize the power of light, and to highlight the objective for which we all are fighting together. However, no one should assemble in colonies or roads or anywhere outside their houses.

Hi there,A few days ago, we launched a campaign to provide ratio=
n to so many daily wagers who have lost their livelihood due to the lockdow=
n.We have been able to distribute over 100,000 kits in mo=
re than 20 cities spanning across all metros and smaller cities like Patna,=
 Jhansi, Guwahati, Dehradun and others. Each ration kit that we distribute =
is good for a family of five people for a week =E2=80=93 that means that th=
ese 100,000 ration kits translate to about 1 crore meals (10 million meals =
=3D 100,000 * 7 days * 3 times a day * 5 family members).=All our efforts are supported by people like you who are ge=
nerously donating towards the cause. We are aiming to collect to raise Rs 5=
0 crores from individuals like you, and we are already half way there.&nbsp=
;If you app=
reciate the work we are doing, we would urge you to donate as much as you c=
omfortably can by visitingwww.feedingi=
ndia.org/donate=E2=80=93 we assure you that every single penny =
that you donate will be used to feeding someone who can=E2=80=99t feed them=
selves.Donate NowYour help in the form of donations or simply spreading the =
word about this initiative can help us support lakhs of families with food =
for two weeks.Here is a WhatsApp message you can copy and send to your f=
riends to help the Feed the Daily Wager Campaign =E2=80=93Zomato Feeding Ind=
ia has distributed over 100,000 ration kits to daily wage worker families s=
o far through =E2=80=98Feed the Daily Wager=E2=80=99. Our support can help =
them reach many more families in need.Click to donate: www.feedingindia.org/donateThank you for =
your support, we are all in it together.Deepinder GoyalFounder & CEO, ZomatoIn case you wish to stop receiving =
emails from Zomato, pleaseunsubscribe here

ng sure application is even.4.Use a comb to slick everything=

ith products that are good for your hair health.=

Dear Candidate,
 
Attention BITSAT 2020 Aspirants

In view of the current situation, and requests received from prospective candidates, the deadline for submission of Online applications for BITSAT-2020 is extended till 26th April 2020 (5.00pm).

Under the circumstances, BITSAT-2020 examination, earlier scheduled during May 16-25, 2020, shall be now held after May 24, 2020. The new test dates, along with other changes in the schedule for admissions, shall be announced later at this website (https://www.bitsadmission.com/index.aspx). All are advised to check this website regularly for updates.

Best wishes,
Admissions Team, BITS-Pilani

r head. The reason being; if you do a good job on the side you're least com=

Stay inside with these scorching hot books of summer, lots of reading recommendations for beloved authors, & our interview with Emma Straub!    
  

 
          Goodreads
[http://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1501538213-1501538213_goodreads_misc.png]
[https://www.goodreads.com?rto=x_gr_e_nl_general&utm_medium=email&utm_source=newsletter&utm_campaign=may052020&utm_content=header]
       
  

 
           
  
  
 
          
  
  

 
          


Scorching ReadsSummer Hot Books [https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1588007318-1588007318_goodreads_misc.png]
A New Season of Reading: The Hot Books of SummerAs we gear up for summer, we may not find ourselves packing books for our far-flung vacations, but that doesn't mean you can't be transported to wherever the pages take you! Check out the season's most anticipated releases from authors includingJennifer Weiner,Brit Bennett,Max Brooks, and many more!Read
more
[https://www.goodreads.com/blog/show/1823?rto=x_gr_e_nl_general&utm_medium=email&utm_source=newsletter&utm_campaign=may052020&utm_content=Summer.Hot.Books]    
  

 
           
  

 
          


Reading RecommendationsCurated Reading [https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1588007354-1588007354_goodreads_misc.png]
Stay In and Read with These Curated RecommendationsHave more time for reading but can't find a book to match your mood? We asked some of the most popular authors on Goodreads to curate reading lists for you. Check outElizabeth Gilbert's books to remind us of our strength,Glennon Doyle's books for challenging times, orJames Patterson's all-time-favorite thrillers.Read
more
[https://www.goodreads.com/blog/show/1842-curated-reading-recommendations-from-authors-you-love?rto=x_gr_e_nl_general&utm_medium=email&utm_source=newsletter&utm_campaign=may052020&utm_content=Curated.Reading]    
  

 
          


Exclusive InterviewInterview Emma Straub [https://images.gr-assets.com/misc/1588007377-1588007377_goodreads_misc.png]
Emma Straub Talks Writing, Reading, and FamilyAuthor and bookstore ownerEmma Straubis back this month with her highly anticipated family dramedyAll Adults Here. She talked with Goodreads about her new novel and why "writing fiction and reading fiction is the best, cheapest way to live a totally different life and to go somewhere outside of your skin."Read
more
[https://www.goodreads.com/interviews/show/1509.Emma_Straub?rto=x_gr_e_nl_general&utm_medium=email&utm_source=newsletter&utm_campaign=may052020&utm_content=Interview.Straub]

One Time Password for SET Registration Form	
Dear ADARSH SHARMA,

684371 is the One Time Password (OTP) for SET Registration form. 

OTP is valid for 10 minutes from the time you have generated the same. 

OTP has also been sent to your preferred mobile number registered with
us.

Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Date:  08/05/2020 	
Subject: Your Symbiosis Entrance Test 2020 Registration 	
	
Dear ADARSH SHARMA,

Congratulations! Your SET / SLAT / SEED/ SITEEE ID has been generated.
Your ID and Password are: 

SET/SLAT/SEED/SITEEE 2020 ID:   200351586 
Category:   OPEN 
Password:   HuA7S8nb 
Email ID:   adarsh.raigarha@gmail.com 

Please use this ID and Password to complete your registration process. 

Last date of payment for SET/SLAT/SEED/SITEEE 2020: May 10, 2020 
Entrance Test Date: Will be declared soon. 

Step 1.

Logon to www.set-test.org using your ID and password and pay your
SLAT/SEED/SET/SITEEE registration fee(s)

? The entrance test registration fee for SET / SLAT / SEED is Rs.
1750/-. (Non-refundable and non-transferable). 

? In addition to the above mentioned fee, you are also expected to pay
the programme registration fee of Rs. 1000/- for each
programme.(Non-refundable and non-transferable) by the last date of
programme registration. Please visit the respective institutes' website
for details regarding this. 

? The entrance test fee for SITEEE is Rs. 2000/- (Non-refundable and
Non-transferable). This includes the programme registration fee of the
programme offered by Symbiosis Institute of Technology (SIT) and you
need not pay Rs 1000/- separately. 

? If you wish to take a test in the morning as well as afternoon
session you will have to pay the entrance test registration fee for
both tests. Payment can be made using: 

*	Billdesk Payment Gateway 
*	Easebuzz Payment Gateway 
*	Indian Bank Payment Gateway 
*	Demand Draft.

Step 2. 

It is mandatory to pay programme-wise Payment for Selection Process
(PI-WAT) of Rs.1000/- for each programme (non-refundable payment and
non-transferable) towards individual programme(s) / institute(s) of
your choice. This can be paid by logging into the SET portal
(www.set-test.org)using your ID and
password and selecting from the above mentioned payment options. Along
with your entrance test payment you can pay, for programme (s) of the
institute of your choice. 

NOTE: No separate programme registration fee is required to be paid for
SIT 

Your registration process will be complete only after the above
mentioned steps are followed. Please note that you may be shortlisted
for a particular programme only if: 

?You have applied for that particular programme(s) by paying the
programme registration fee before the last date

?Your SET / SLAT / SEED / SITEEE score is equal to or more than the
cut-off for that programme


Please take a printout of this email and keep it for future
correspondence. The SET / SLAT / SEED / SITEEE Admit Card will be
available on the SET website (www.set-test.org)well ahead of the date of the entrance
test. 

*At any time later, if any information given by you in the application
is found to be incorrect or misleading, your candidature/admission will
be cancelled and no fee will be refunded.

*	AADHAR CARD (UID CARD)
*	Passport

*	PAN Card

Important Note - Paying to SET/SLAT/SEED is only the first step. You

by logging into the SET portal (www.set-test.org)using your SET/SLAT/SEED ID and password
and selecting from the above mentioned payment option of your choice.
	
Please remember to take a printout and keep a copy of this for future

Dear Aspirant,
 
Those candidates who have applied to appear in BITSAT-2020 and have paid the requisite application fee before deadline are hereby informed that the facility for correction to the particulars entered in the Online Application Form will be made operational from on 15/05/2020 to 20/05/2020 (5.00pm IST). The candidates are advised to visit the website www.bitsadmission.com and login to their account by using their user id and password and verify their particulars to make necessary corrections wherever required.

Following fields are not editable:

1. Name
2. Gender
3. Email id
4. Phone number

For above fields please write to fic.fd@pilani.bits-pilani.ac.in

The Correction window will open at 10:00 am (IST) on 15th May 2020 and will be closed at 5:00 pm (IST) on 20th May 2020.


Admissions Team
BITSAT-2020

Hello! How are you doing today?

As an essential service provider, Zomato is taking extra care to ensure tha=
t the food we provide you has gone through multiple safety checks before it=
 reaches your doorstep. Here are the 8 things we are doing for safe food de=
liveries=F0=9F=91=87

https://bnc.lt/WJml/rOHkAFcHt6

All our restaurant partners sanitize their kitchens every few hours.

https://bnc.lt/WJml/rOHkAFcHt6

It is compulsory for restaurant staff to use protective masks in kitchens.

https://bnc.lt/WJml/rOHkAFcHt6

Staff is allowed to work only if their body temperature is below 99=C2=B0F

https://bnc.lt/WJml/rOHkAFcHt6

Just like restaurant staff, our delivery partners go through daily temperat=
ure checks.

https://bnc.lt/WJml/rOHkAFcHt6

While on duty, all our delivery partners wear masks.

https://bnc.lt/WJml/rOHkAFcHt6

Before picking up every order, our delivery partners wash/sanitize their ha=
nds.

https://bnc.lt/WJml/rOHkAFcHt6

Contact Tracing of delivery partners is done using Aarogya Setu (by Govt. o=
f India).

https://bnc.lt/WJml/rOHkAFcHt6

Contactless Delivery helps our riders maintain social distancing with you.

With our 8 MAX Safety Measures, your order is safe at every step. Stay home=
, stay strong, you can count on us if you need food!

View restaurants https://bnc.lt/WJml/PSLiIsQHt6

Please note that very rarely, one or more safety features may not be availa=
ble due to physical constraints.

https://bnc.lt/WJml/rOHkAFcHt6

ine is a good way to keep you from going crazy during this time ofSoci=
al Distancing.That routine includes getting ready for your day and doing your hair.&nbsp=
;If your routine has always included styling your hair, you =
should continue the habit! You can even explore new hairstyles or play arou=
nd with volume and texture with justOriginal Styling Merakiand a blow dryer.Having a routine can help us feel more in control as it can=

We hope you are staying safe & following the guidelines!

This mail lets you know about the various spectrums of SIT in terms of peda=
gogy,
latest approaches, events, festivals, and some of the testimonials shared b=
y our
beloved students, their parents, and our subject-matter-experts, a.k.a, the
faculty.

We know you wish to know about SIT by personally visiting us, which you sur=
ely
can after the situation normalizes; but till then you can check this person=
al

Thanks,

Regards

Admissions Team,

SIT Pune

p;Keep Your Hair T=
idy And HealthyWhether you have thick o=
r thin, straight or curly hair, you're most likely eager to get a haircut. =
With an electric razor or body grooming razor, we've got some tips below to=
 keep your hair tidy. When you're all finished, don't forget to use hair ca=
re products like ourCloud Control Hair Oil.=HELP IS =
HEREFirst make sure you're using a guard because you don't wa=
nt to accidentally buzz off more hair than you want.Secondly start with your side burns, and work your way ar=
ound your ear.If you're confident start slowly on your sides. Find your p=
art of the hair that separates the sides and make sure you're using a guard=
. Start small and switch guards when you're more comfortable.&=

Hey, missing your favourite food and still can=E2=
=80=99t convince yourself to have it delivered from your favourite restaura=
nt?Don=E2=
=80=99t worry, we are here to ensure that your order is safe at every step,=
 from the restaurant kitchen to your doorstep. Have a look=F0=9F=91=87All our restaurant partners sanitise their kitchens every=
 few hours.It is compulsory for restaurant staff to use protective m=
asks in kitchens.Staff is allowed to work only if their body temperature i=
s below 99=C2=B0F.Just like restaurant staff, our delivery partners go thro=
ugh daily temperature checks.While on duty, all our delivery partners wear masks.Before picking up every order, our delivery partners wash=
/sanitise their hands.Contact Tracing of delivery partners is done using Aarogy=
a Setu (by Govt. of India).Contactless Delivery helps our riders practise social dis=
tancing with you.With our8 MAX Safety Measures, your ord=
er is safe at every step. Still thinking? Have your favourites delivered ho=
me now!View restaurantsIn case you wish to stop receiving emails from Zomato, pleaseunsubscribe here

Dear Aspirant,

Greetings from Symbiosis International (Deemed University)!

This is to inform you that considering the adverse conditions currently
prevailing in several parts of the country, the SET, SLAT and SITEEE tests =
stand
postponed.=20

Consequently, the mock/demo that was scheduled for 24th May also stands
postponed.

Details regarding the new dates and the process for the same will be shared
soon. You are advised to visit the SET portal regularly to check on the upd=
ates.

Warm Regards

Hey, you!

It=E2=80=99s me, your favourite Biryani. I know we have grown (just a littl=
e) apart in these testing times. But no worries, I am here to assure you th=
at our love is safe, even more so with Zomato=E2=80=99s 8 MAX Safety Measur=
es in place.

Allow me to take you through my journey from the restaurant kitchen to your=
 doorstep!

https://bnc.lt/WJml/wg35qJdXJ6

First, I am prepared in a well-sanitised kitchen by staff wearing protectiv=
e masks, after having their temperature checked.

https://bnc.lt/WJml/wg35qJdXJ6

I am then passed on to a delivery partner who wears a clean mask, gets the =
temperature check done and washes hands before order pick-up.

https://bnc.lt/WJml/wg35qJdXJ6

My delivery partner and I zip through the city while taking extra care usin=
g the Aarogya Setu App.=E2=80=8B

https://bnc.lt/WJml/wg35qJdXJ6

Finally, I am left outside the door on a clean surface if you opt-in for Co=
ntactless Delivery.

So as you can see, Zomato=E2=80=99s restaurant and delivery partners are ma=
king sure that you and I end up together, with a layer of safety to complim=
ent us perfectly. I=E2=80=99d be waiting for you on the Zomato app, have me=
 over whenever you miss me.

I want to order! https://bnc.lt/WJml/tBfNvS8WJ6

o so keeping in mind that we are extra-cautious about your safety and are d=
oing everything necessary to bring your food safely.Also, now is a good enough time to greet your favourite f=
ood item at your doorstep.Order NowIn case you wish to stop receiving emails from Zomato, pleaseunsubscribe here

As an engineering aspirant you must have a lot of doubts regarding the impa=
ct
that the COVID-19 pandemic could potentially create on our lives with respe=
ct to
the use of Technology and being in the field of Engineering.

We can clearly see that it is now important to let you know the future of
Technology and the way you can shape your career as an Engineer. Hence, we
request you to join us for the webinar to get answers to all the questions.

We have scheduled a Webinar on Tuesday, 9th June 2020 at 06:00 PM.

Topic: Why Engineering is a promising career post COVID-19?

MODERATOR:

Dr. Shruti Patil

Assistant Professor, CS & IT Dept.

Symbiosis Institute of Technology, Pune

PANELISTS

Dr. Sayali Apte

Assistant Professor, Civil Dept.

Symbiosis Institute of Technology, Pune

Dr. Preeti Mulay

Associate Professor, CS & IT Dept.

Symbiosis Institute of Technology, Pune

Dr. Bhaskar

Professor, E & TC Dept.

Symbiosis Institute of Technology, Pune

Dr. Arun Kumar

Associate Professor, Mechanical Dept.

Symbiosis Institute of Technology, Pune

Hi there,We=
 at Zomato are taking all possible necessary steps to ensure safe food deli=
very. We are also actively encouraging our restaurant partners to adhere to=
 guidelines by Food Safety and Standards Authority of India (FSSAI). Click =hereto read more.We=
 follow stringent Max Safety Measures that include the following:Con=
tactless Delivery: This feature on our app helps our riders mainta=
in social distancing with you. According to FSSAI, even if you don=E2=80=99=
t opt for Contactless Delivery, you are advised to maintain a 1-meter gap b=
etween you and the delivery partner.Con=
tactless Payment: Our users are strongly urged to make online paym=
ents to avoid exchange of cash with our delivery partners. In case of cash =
payment, you are supposed to wash your hands thoroughly later.Rid=
er hygiene: All our delivery partners are provided protective mask=
s and go through daily temperature checks. Moreover, they are allowed to ha=
ndle your order only after washing their hands.Res=
taurant hygiene: All our restaurant partners follow WHO advisory a=
nd sanitize their kitchens every few hours. Restaurant staff wear masks at =
all times and regular body temperature checks are conducted.Ea=
ch of these measures are in place so that you don=E2=80=99t have to think t=
wice before ordering in. The distance between people might have increased b=
ut the distance between you and your favourite food doesn=E2=80=99t have to=
.=In case you wish to stop receiving emails from Zomato, pleaseunsubscribe here

=20=20International Day of Yoga 2020=20
 =20=20Having t=
rouble reading this email?View it in your mobile/ web browser=20=20=20=20=20=20=20=20=20=20=20=20=20=20=20Dear friend,=20=20=20Greetings from the Ministry of AYUSH, Government of=
 India. It is a privilege to write to you against the backdrop of the Inter=
national Day of Yoga (IDY) -2020, which is just a few days away.=20=20=20Many of our fellow-citizens have been asking this qu=
estion of late: I want to be a part of IDY -2020; but what should I do for =
it? This message tries to clarify the position.=20=20=20Yoga is an invaluable ancient Indian practice with n=
umerous benefits to both physical and mental health. Given the context of t=
he current COVID-19 pandemic including restrictions on the movement of peop=
le and a slowdown in economic activity, the benefits offered by Yoga have b=
ecome especially important for physical and mental wellbeing. Of particular=
 importance are its proven benefits on general health and immunity enhancem=
ent, along with its globally accepted role as a stress buster.=20=20The mass performance of the Common Yoga Protocol (C=
YP)-one of the most popular Yoga programmes across the world-will remain at=
 the heart of the International Day of Yoga (IDY) like always, but this yea=
r IDY will be observed in a non-congregative manner. Therefore, you and you=
r family are requested to join thousands of others on this day from your re=
spective homes by doing the 45- minute long CYP drill at 7.00 AM on 21st Ju=
ne 2020. It is designed to be easily adoptable by the majority of the peopl=
e irrespective of age and gender, and can be learnt through simple training=
 sessions, even through online classes (individuals facing health issues ar=
e advised to consult a physician before taking up Yoga practice)..=20To make the observation of IDY at home possible, th=
e Ministry of AYUSH and other stakeholders have been running multiple train=
ing programmes on Yoga and CYP. You may follow the Ministry's social media =
handles for additional details. Announcement on specific activities for 21s=
t June 2020 will also be made available on these channels as we approach th=
e IDY. Please use the attached resources in preparing yourself and your fam=
ily for IDY 2020. If you are already trained in CYP, please start teaching =
the same to your family members.=20As June 21st is just a few days away. Prepare yours=
elf and be there to do Yoga with the world. See you at 7.00 AM on 21st June=
 2020.=20Warm regards,PN Ranjit Kumar, Joint Secretar=
y, Ministry of AYUSH=20=20=20=20=20=20=20https://main.ayush.gov.in/=20https://yoga.ayush.gov.in/yoga/=20https://www.facebook.com/moayush/=20=20=20https://twitter.com/moayush=20https=
://www.instagram.com/ministryofayush/?hl=3Den=20https=
://www.youtube.com/c/MinistryofAYUSHofficial=20=20=20http://www.yogamdniy.nic.in/=20http://ccryn.gov.in/=20http://punenin.org/index.htm=20=20=20http=
s://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3DK-GJh9GeOxE=20http=
s://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3DwgjZ_LyNLRw=20=20=20=20=20=20=20=20=20=20=20=20=20=20Share it on Social Media<=
a class=3D"twitter-share-button" target=3D"_blank" href=3D"https://twitter.=
com/intent/tweet?hashtags=3DeSampark.Gov&url=3Dhttp%3A%2F%2Fjan-sampark=
.nic.in%2Fcampaigns%2F2020%2F19-Jun%2FAYUSH%2Findex.html" data-size=3D"larg=
e" data-text=3D"custom share text">==20Forward it to a Friend=20=20=20=20=20=20=
This message was sent to adarsh.raigarha[at]gmail[dot]com fromMinistry of AYUSHthr=
ough no-reply[at]sampark[dot]gov[dot]in=20If you would prefer not to receive these emails please clickuns=
ubscribe=20=20=20=20=20=20

All other deadlines announced earlier remain unchanged.

BITS Admissions Team

Dear Applicant,

Greetings from Symbiosis International (Deemed University) [SIU] !!!

We thank you for your patience as we navigate through turbulent times. We h=
ave
received representations from parents and aspirants regarding the apprehens=
ions
about conducting a computer-based entrance test for the Under Graduate
programmes at SIU.

Further to the representations and owing to the following reasons :
    our concern over the safety of the applicants taking the entrance tests=
 at a
    designated center,
    extension of lockdown in some parts of the country,
    cancellation / postponement of similar All India level public examinati=
ons,
    rising number of coronavirus infected cases in the country,=20
    prevailing uncertainty over the direction the pandemic may take,
    loss of time for the delivery of academic sessions and
    career and aspirations of our candidates and students,=20
SIU has decided not to conduct SET B / SLAT / SITEEE in a computer-based te=
st
mode at test centres.=20
One of the strongest and most viable alternatives is reverting to an
internet-based, proctored test mode which an applicant can take from the sa=
fety,
security, and comfort of her/his home. The details regarding the same will =
be
communicated to you at the earliest.
We will also keep you posted on further developments and infrastructure
requirements through mails sent to your registered email ID and SET portal =
as
soon as these are finalised.

We trust that you will support us in these trying times. This too shall pas=
s and
we look forward to opening up our campuses to our students as soon as feasi=
ble.=20

Stay Safe. Stay Home. All the best!

Warm Regards,

=20

Symbiosis Test Secretariat

Dear ADARSH SHARMA  ,

This is further to our earlier communication regarding SET-B / SLAT / SITEE=
E /
AIAT not being conducted in a computer-based test mode.

As we revert to an internet-based remote-proctored test, we will guide you
through the process to ensure that you face no difficulties on the day of t=
he
test.

The most critical first step towards being able to successfully appear for =
the
same is the Infrastructure Readiness Check (IRC).

Infrastructure Readiness Check

In this step, ensure that your system and internet bandwidth / speed are as=
 per
the requirement of taking the internet-based remote-proctored test. Details=
 of
the infrastructure requirement and the process to be followed for the IRC a=
re
attached along with this email. These documents can also be viewed on the s=
et
website:

1. Infrastructure Requirement Details (click hereto access the same)

2. IRC Process Document (click hereto access the s=
ame)

Please go through the attached IRC Process Document and below mentioned vid=
eo
link before you take the Infrastructure Readiness Check.

https://youtu.be/irh60fiC850

In case you face any issue during this process, you will have the opportuni=
ty to
communicate the issue to the Technical Helpdesk by raising a ticket via cha=
t.
Once the technical issues are resolved, and the checks are successfully
completed, your system would be ready for the test. You are advised to use =
the
same system and internet connection for all your future processes till the =
SET B
/ SLAT / SITEEE examination is completed.

Please note that your IRC is scheduled from 10 a.m. to 12 noon on 9th July =
2020

The URL for Login and your Login credentials will be shared with you via a
separate communication.

Thank you.

Stay Home. Stay Safe. Stay Healthy.

u
will use for taking our internet based remote proctored entrance test.

early as 8:00 a.m. on 9 July 2020 and complete all the prerequisite system

on.

Once the above activities are successfully concluded, please launch the Lau=
ncher
and complete a short 45-minute assessment.

wever
in order to ensure your internet is able to upload videos captured from you=
r
system and they meet quality standards you should spend a minimum of 5 minu=
tes
on the assessment before submitting it.

ries apart

the IRC.

the

* Test ends : 11:30 a.m. (12:00 noon for Differently Abled applicants)

It is mandatory for you to complete self-registration by 9:30 a.m.=E3=80=80

f
test and enter the below-mentioned login ID & password

* You will be directed to the registration page. Complete registration proc=
ess
by following instructions on screen.

Your login credentials for actual test =E2=80=93

Login ID: 200351586

Password: 18092002

Important Test Instructions =E2=80=93

*=E3=80=80You must take the test for the entire duration. The test will get=
 auto
submitted once the entire duration gets completed.=E3=80=80

* Maintain use of same system and same configuration on which IRC & DRC wer=
e
completed.=E3=80=80

* Read through the=E3=80=80 Test Instructions,=E3=80=80 FAQs=E3=80=80and=E3=80=80 Candidate Dos=
 &Don=E2=80=99ts=E3=80=80before start of Test.

* Link for logging in to Test Portal will be active at 8:00 a.m. on 19 July
2020.=E3=80=80

* For all support, post your logging in to Test Portal, register your query=
 in
the "Helpdesk" tab in the Assessment Portal.=E3=80=80

For better understanding of test process we suggest you to go through the
below-mentioned videos.

Help desk feature processCandidate Instructions' portalAll the Best!=E3=80=80

Dear Candidates,

Greetings from Symbiosis Institute of Technology!

We appreciate your cooperation and promptness regarding the document upload=
ing
process on our online admission portal.

Few of these documents are compulsory to be uploaded for the merit listing
procedure. Other documents can be uploaded as and when available to you bef=
ore
commencement of the new academic session.

Following is a list of observations regarding the uploaded documents for yo=
ur
information and necessary corrective action -

    Mandatory documents like Aadhar card and 10th mark sheet have important
    information printed on both sides. It is observed that in many cases ca=
ndidates
    have scanned and uploaded only one side of the document. Kindly upload =
one pdf
    file for each document, containing scans of both sides / all pages of t=
hat
    document in the pdf.

    It is observed that in some cases, the 10th mark sheet is uploaded in t=
he
    place of the 10th passing certificate and vice versa. All are advised t=
o upload
    the correct document pdf against the corresponding document title.

    All candidates are advised to ensure that the uploaded document pdfs co=
ntain
    clear and readable scanned pages of the required documents.

Document verification is an important part of our admission process and to =
check
eligibility criteria. We expect positive cooperation from you in this regar=
d.
This will help us execute the online admission process smoothly and avoid
unnecessary delays.

Please note that the online document uploading process is currently live. T=
he
last date to upload the required document pdfs is 25th July, 2020 midnight.

Documents uploading URL:https://set.ishinfosys.com/SITEEE/Register/Index.aspx

Please contact us for any query at -

=C3=98 Email: btechadmissions@sitpune.edu.in

=C3=98 Contact Numbers:

+91-20-28116300/6464/6419

+91 9112299250

+91 9112299251

Regards,

Admissions Team,

Symbiosis Institute of Technology, Pune.

Date:  24/07/2020	
Subject: SITEEE Registration	
SITEEE Registration Successful	
Dear ADARSH SHARMA,

Thank you for registering yourself in one of the best management
institutes in India. SITEEE has been consistently ranked among top 25
B-schools in India and top 10 in the western zones. SITEEE is also
rated as A++ by various business magazines such as The week, Business
Standard, Business India to name a few.

We are a constituent of the prestigious Symbiosis International
University offering a gamut of Management programs. We offer 2 years
Full-Time Residential MBA program with a global perspective. We have an
MOU with LEEDS Metropolitan University, UK for Student Exchange
Program. We also have 12 months Full-Time PGPM, Part time programmes
MBA(Executive) and PG Diplomas in management education for working
executives.

We at SITEEE offer an enriching learning environment complemented with
faculty having sound Academic as well as Industry experience. SITEEE
boasts of Campus infrastructure of optimal quality which includes
Auditorium, fully equipped Classrooms with LCD projectors, extensive
collection of titles in the Library, Computer Lab with latest soft
wares like SAP, SPSS, and Prowess etc.We have recreational facilities
which include Basket Ball, Table Tennis, Health Centre and swimming
pool.

SITEEE campus has consistently proved to be a major resource pool for
the finest companies over the years. SITEEE has been awarded the Best B
School in "Innovation in Placements" by DNA innovative B-School Awards
on 17th February 2014.

Looking forward to having you as part of SITEEE

ALL THE BEST!


This email contains your SITEEE ID and  password. Please take a
printout of this email and keep it for future correspondence.
Please ignore this mail, if you have already received it. 

SITEEE ID:   200351586
Email ID:   adarsh.raigarha@gmail.com
Password:  adarshsharma

You can use this SITEEE ID to modify your details.

At any time later, if any information given by you in the application
is found to be incorrect or misleading, your candidature/admission will
be cancelled and no fee will be refunded.

Date:  24/07/2020	
Subject: Documents Uploaded Successfully for Online Admission Rounds at
Symbiosis Institute of Technology!	
	
Dear Candidate, 	

Heartiest Congratulations on taking another step towards becoming a
part of the Symbiosis Institute of Technology (SIT) family by uploading
required documents for the subsequent admission rounds.

In view of the current pandemic situations, SIT has deployed effective
online teaching, learning and evaluation systems for its students. All
admission rounds will also be conducted completely online. 

After document verification, the next step is merit listing during
admission rounds. A letter will be sent soon to all aspirants detailing
this process. 

Please keep checking the institute website www.sitpune.edu.in for
admission related updates. Please keep checking your emails for updates
as well. Do get in touch with us for any query. 

Admission Team 
Symbiosis Institute of Technology 	
Please remember to take a printout and keep a copy of this for future
reference and verification.

the
perpetual improvement and quality education as well as the all-rounder
development of the students. In light of that, we are arranging the Golden

lds.

inspiring talk by one of India's acclaimed stalwarts Dr. R.A. Mashelkar, FR=
S,

e by

day,

Dear Candidates,

Greetings from Symbiosis Institute of Technology!

We appreciate your cooperation and promptness regarding the document upload=
ing
process on our online admission portal.

Few of these documents are compulsory to be uploaded for the merit listing
procedure. Other documents can be uploaded as and when available to you bef=
ore
commencement of the new academic session.

Following is a list of observations regarding the uploaded documents for yo=
ur
information and necessary corrective action -

    Mandatory documents like Aadhar card and 10th mark sheet have important
    information printed on both sides. It is observed that in many cases ca=
ndidates
    have scanned and uploaded only one side of the document. Kindly upload =
one pdf
    file for each document, containing scans of both sides / all pages of t=
hat
    document in the pdf.

    It is observed that in some cases, the 10th mark sheet is uploaded in t=
he
    place of the 10th passing certificate and vice versa. All are advised t=
o upload
    the correct document pdf against the corresponding document title.

ntain

ocument in our document

=E3=80=80from the computer screen or
from the internet. Instead, scan the original document clearly and upload i=

with proper format.

DF
file and upload it at our=E3=80=80document=E3=80=80uploading portal (E.g 10=

e do
understand that this decision is important and requires clarification of ma=
ny

Dear Candidates,

=20

Greetings from Symbiosis Institute of Technology!

=20

This is regarding the payment confirmation emails being sent to you
acknowledging the payments made towards the first installment of the admiss=
ion
fees.

=20

Sometimes, the payments processed by you are not settled by the concerned b=
ank
in real time, resulting in these settlements being executed the next day.
Thereafter, the settlement reports are sent to the university via BILLDESK,
followed by the auto acknowledgement emails being sent to your registered e=
mail
IDs.

=20

Hence, sometimes this process takes more time than usual. We request you to=
 keep
calm and be assured of receiving payment acknowledgement emails soon after
executing the said payments.=20

=20

We understand the importance of this acknowledgement and will be happy to
support and assist you in this respect.=20

=20

Yours Sincerely,

=20

First Year B.Tech. Admissions Team

Symbiosis Institute of Technology, Pune

ional admission today for Mechanical fee category 1.
The allotted branch was my 4th preference and 3rd preference was CS (fee ca=
tegory 2).
In reference to the above I have following queries
Questions-
So if the reject the seat allotted will I move to second phase counselling =
automatically ?
Will I be upgrade from Mechanical to CS if a vacancy is created if somebody=
 leaves the seat in the first semester?
Hope to hear soon.


Also I would like to highlight the fact that all the helpline numbers are u=
navailable which has caused a delay in decision.

p>At the outset, let me compliment you for=

our smartness & courage to face challenging situations in life. This is=
 irrespective of whether you join Amrita or not. Attempting a competitive e=
xamination in the present context itself is a big achievement. Having been =
a teacher for the past 18 years, I always hear from my students about the d=
ifficulties they had to go through their studies. These moments are now har=
d, but it is for sure, that you will cherish these moments throughout the l=
ife.Let me remind on few point=
s:Ther=
e is absolutely NO need to be nervousIn case if some mishap happens in between, you will get =
another chance to attend AEEE2020.Make sure that you have mobile with you, phone for us to co=
ntact in case of any urgency.Do not move away from the camera throughout the session.Attempting in mobile is tr=
eated invalid.Subs=
cribe to ourTelegram Channel/Join ChatGroup for all important, early updates.&=
nbsp;Wishing you=
 all the best!=
p>Maheshwara Chaitanya,Chairman (Engineering-UG =
